name: The Slumbering Woods (DEMO)
description:
I'd like to start by taking a second to thank you all for at the very least coming to the page, and if you enjoy what you play, I'll be doing many more games in the not too distant future, so I hope you'll consider staying up to date with my projects via my YouTube, Twitter, and Instagram! Links are down below, have a wonderful day, hope to see you again!

NM&Co. YouTube Channel

Twitter (Hardly Use)

Instagram

Your boss wants you to investigate the Slumbering Woods, a location next to your office. There were reports of some creatures roaming the woods, and if the creatures remain there, well, nobody will feel safe coming to your office. So, your job is to eliminate the creatures in the six hours the boss gives you. If you do, you'll receive a huge raise. Think you can handle it?

Several Free Assets were used to maximize this experience, as I am still beginning my game dev journey, and do not have all the tools to make this game. All scripting and development was done by me, but here's a list of free assets used in this project, all of which can be downloaded from the Unity Asset Store.

Flashlight PRO     AllSkyFree (Highly Recommend)     FPS Icons Pack     Bed & Bath Furniture Pack     Free Horror Tracks     Procedural Fire     Free SpeedTrees     Old Boat Lower Deck Hatch Pack 1     Sci-Fi Door     Standard Assets Pack     Thaleah PixelFont     HQ Modern Sofas Pack     True Horror Crawler     Free Sound Effects Pack     MS Sports Car     Realistic Bed_01     Survival Old House     Rain Drop Effect 2     Volumetric Light Beam

Title Music by the Incredible Heatley Bros

CONTROLS

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Spacebar to Interact/Jump

Shift to Run

Left Click to Shoot, Mouse to Aim

If the game is stuck on a black screen, give it some time. The slower the PC, the longer the load. This could anywhere from a few seconds to several minutes.
